ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
CodeDisplayDefinition
HIV.D.DE957Screening with coughTB screening algorithm - Screening with cough
HIV.D.DE958Screening with any TB symptomTB screening algorithm - Screening with any TB symptom
HIV.D.DE959W4SS single screening algorithmTB screening algorithm - W4SS single screening algorithm
HIV.D.DE960CRP single screening algorithmTB screening algorithm - CRP single screening algorithm
HIV.D.DE961CXR single screening algorithmTB screening algorithm - CXR single screening algorithm
HIV.D.DE962Parallel screening algorithm with W4SS and CRPTB screening algorithm - Parallel screening algorithm with W4SS and CRP
HIV.D.DE963Sequential positive screening algorithm with W4SS and CRPTB screening algorithm - Sequential positive screening algorithm with W4SS and CRP
HIV.D.DE964Sequential negative screening algorithm with W4SS and CRPTB screening algorithm - Sequential negative screening algorithm with W4SS and CRP
HIV.D.DE965Parallel screening algorithm with W4SS and CXRTB screening algorithm - Parallel screening algorithm with W4SS and CXR
HIV.D.DE966Sequential positive screening algorithm with W4SS and CXRTB screening algorithm - Sequential positive screening algorithm with W4SS and CXR
HIV.D.DE967Sequential negative screening algorithm with W4SS and CXRTB screening algorithm - Sequential negative screening algorithm with W4SS and CXR
HIV.D.DE968Screening with mWRDTB screening algorithm - Screening with mWRD
HIV.D.DE969Clinical assessmentTB screening algorithm - Clinical assessment
HIV.D.DE970Other TB screening algorithmTB screening algorithm - Other TB screening algorithm

description.value: Codes representing possible values for the TB screening algorithm element

display.value: Parallel screening algorithm with W4SS and CRP
